price: 91. Taigi (tai buvo)! Ir Mes žinojome apie jį (Zul-Karnain) viską.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
